items.title: Removed lazy-loading for article header image
items.description: If config `imageLoading.lazy` is set to `true` Baseview will add the attribute `loading` with the value `lazy` to images. Each element can use property `image.noLazy` (boolean) to override this. The property is added to images in the article-header.

items.title: Updated filtered data in templates
items.description: Due to a change in Labrador all elements holds separate filtered data regardless of source-data. Baseview-templates for `articleFooter` and `articleMeta` are updated to read filtered data from root (page).
